akn:section.akn:heading: Known claims against dissolved limited partnership.

akn:content.akn:p: A dissolved limited partnership may dispose of the known claims against it by following the procedure described in subsection (b) of this section.
A dissolved limited partnership may notify its known claimants of the dissolution in a record. The notice shall:
A claim against a dissolved limited partnership shall be barred if the requirements of subsection (b) of this section are met and:
This section shall not apply to a claim based on an event occurring after the effective date of dissolution or a liability that is contingent on that date.
